body_text:
Hello lovely humans,
postcss-loader just published its new version 0.11.0.

  
    
      State
    
    
      Update 🚀
    
  
  
    
      Dependency
    
    
      postcss-loader
    
  
  
    
      New version
    
    
      0.11.0
    
  
  
    
      Type
    
    
      devDependency
    
  

This version is not covered by your current version range.
Without accepting this pull request your project will work just like it did before. There might be a bunch of new features, fixes and perf improvements that the maintainers worked on for you though.
I recommend you look into these changes and try to get onto the latest version of postcss-loader.
Given that you have a decent test suite, a passing build is a strong indicator that you can take advantage of these changes by merging the proposed change into your project. Otherwise this branch is a great starting point for you to work on the update.
Do you have any ideas how I could improve these pull requests? Did I report anything you think isn’t right?
Are you unsure about how things are supposed to work?
There is a collection of frequently asked questions and while I’m just a bot, there is a group of people who are happy to teach me new things. Let them know.
Good luck with your project ✨
You rock!
🌴

The new version differs by 23 commits .

5922a32 Release 0.11 version
48c7151 Clean up README.md
8dc282c Merge pull request #93 from jantimon/feature/postcss-loader-before-processing-event
a570b18 Add postcss-loader-before-processing event
825010b Add node.js 6 to Travis CI
5ce3168 Release 0.10.1 verson
11acece Clean up code
49b3151 Merge pull request #87 from andreypopp/concise-error-message
90048b4 Consistent format for CSS syntax errors
fea2ab9 Release 0.10 version
7df7aeb Add sourceMap=inline test
cabd477 Return sourceMap parameter option
20fbe41 Update dependencies
c5b6da4 Fix docs structure
3305c74 Rename sourceMap to inlineMap

There are 23 commits in total. See the full diff.

This pull request was created by greenkeeper.io.
Tired of seeing this sponsor message? ⚡️ greenkeeper upgrade

title: Update postcss-loader to version 0.11.0 🚀
body:
Hello lovely humans, [postcss-loader](https://www.npmjs.com/package/postcss-loader) just published its new version 0.11.0.
State Update :rocket:
Dependency postcss-loader
New version 0.11.0
Type devDependency
This version is **not covered** by your **current version range**. Without accepting this pull request your project will work just like it did before. There might be a bunch of new features, fixes and perf improvements that the maintainers worked on for you though. I recommend you look into these changes and try to get onto the latest version of postcss-loader. Given that you have a decent test suite, a passing build is a strong indicator that you can take advantage of these changes by merging the proposed change into your project. Otherwise this branch is a great starting point for you to work on the update. Do you have any ideas how I could improve these pull requests? Did I report anything you think isn’t right? Are you unsure about how things are supposed to work? There is a collection of [frequently asked questions](https://greenkeeper.io/faq.html) and while I’m just a bot, there is a group of people who are happy to teach me new things. [Let them know](https://github.com/greenkeeperio/greenkeeper/issues/new). Good luck with your project :sparkles: You rock! :palm_tree: --- The new version differs by 23 commits . - [`5922a32`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/5922a3227ae224c66aa62308698d794e9efc1464) Release 0.11 version - [`a570b18`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/a570b184b0b968362ebdb87f0e1fe45a74f81768) Add postcss-loader-before-processing event - [`825010b`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/825010b3c5670cdb0cab4cb8ef2add6ab716fff7) Add node.js 6 to Travis CI - [`5ce3168`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/5ce3168906afe79fa7db8ad993bec2133963bf43) Release 0.10.1 verson - [`11acece`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/11acecedc64d3c88e1f703d2056b024121c93850) Clean up code - [`49b3151`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/49b3151a0358dfca4275d34f8501b4aff9d65869) Merge pull request #87 from andreypopp/concise-error-message - [`90048b4`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/90048b432569b3a2d89e2fa6d64f8f72ac6e1bd6) Consistent format for CSS syntax errors - [`cabd477`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/cabd47725b8b5f6da0c3ca4ca4794c10ecbd1acf) Return sourceMap parameter option - [`20fbe41`](https://github.com/postcss/postcss-loader/commit/20fbe4106e4606a1d4e5d25d255f44817b8a20cb) Update dependencies -
